content:
Statements & Releases			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
July 4, 2020
On Saturday, July 4, 2020, the President signed into law:S. 4116, which (1) reauthorizes lending under the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) through August 8, 2020; and (2) separates the authorized limits for commitments under the PPP from other Small Business Administration loan programs.
